headline: Netflix Reportedly Prepares All-Cash Bid For Warner Bros. As Paramount Turns Up Heat On Takeover Battle
summary: Netflix Inc. (NASDAQ:NFLX) is reportedly preparing to revise the terms of its $82.7 billion deal to buy Warner Bros. Discovery (NASDAQ:WBD) to make it an all-cash offer, as it seeks to fend off Paramount Skydance’s (NASDAQ:PSKY) hostile bid. The revised deal, aimed at offering WBD shareholders a quicker and simpler transaction, is still under negotiation and may change, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter. Netflix and WBD did not immediately respond to
